verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Job \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*:

“\w Truly|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w whom|strong="H5971"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* itself \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*!

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3824"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w inferior|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3824"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*. \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* know \w such|strong="H3644"\w* \w things|strong="H3644"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* these?

\w I|strong="H7121"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w laughingstock|strong="H7814"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*, though \w I|strong="H7121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* God, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w He|strong="H7121"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*. \w The|strong="H7121"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w laughingstock|strong="H7814"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3559"\w* one at \w ease|strong="H7600"\w* scorns misfortune \w as|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* fate \w of|strong="H7272"\w* \w those|strong="H7600"\w* whose \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w are|strong="H7272"\w* slipping.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* tents \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w robbers|strong="H7703"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* safe, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* those \w who|strong="H7951"\w* \w provoke|strong="H7264"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* secure—those \w who|strong="H7951"\w* carry \w their|strong="H7703"\w* \w god|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H7703"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

But \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* animals, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* they \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w instruct|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*; \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* they \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w Or|strong="H5608"\w* \w speak|strong="H7878"\w* \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* it \w will|strong="H3220"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H3384"\w*; let \w the|strong="H5608"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w inform|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H3384"\w*.

\w Which|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w thing|strong="H2416"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w as|strong="H5315"\w* well \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w mankind|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w Does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* ear test \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w as|strong="H2441"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* tongue \w tastes|strong="H2938"\w* \w its|strong="H4405"\w* food?

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* found \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* elderly, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* \w comes|strong="H2451"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* belong \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w*; \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* \w are|strong="H1369"\w* \w His|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w What|strong="H5921"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w tears|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w*; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* man \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w imprisons|strong="H5462"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w released|strong="H6605"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w He|strong="H7971"\w* holds \w back|strong="H6113"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, they \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w if|strong="H2005"\w* \w He|strong="H7971"\w* releases \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, they overwhelm \w the|strong="H7971"\w* land.

True \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w* \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* belong \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w Him|strong="H5973"\w*. \w The|strong="H5973"\w* \w deceived|strong="H7683"\w* \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w deceiver|strong="H7686"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* \w His|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3212"\w* leads \w counselors|strong="H3289"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w barefoot|strong="H7758"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w makes|strong="H1984"\w* \w fools|strong="H1984"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4428"\w* \w loosens|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* bonds placed \w by|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* fastens \w a|strong="H3068"\w* belt around their waists.

\w He|strong="H3212"\w* leads \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w barefoot|strong="H7758"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w overthrows|strong="H5557"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* established.

\w He|strong="H8193"\w* \w deprives|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* trusted \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w takes|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w discernment|strong="H2940"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w pours|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* contempt \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w* \w and|strong="H5921"\w* disarms \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mighty.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w reveals|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* \w things|strong="H1540"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w brings|strong="H3318"\w* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* shadows \w into|strong="H1540"\w* light.

He \w makes|strong="H7679"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w great|strong="H7679"\w* \w and|strong="H1471"\w* destroys \w them|strong="H5148"\w*; He \w enlarges|strong="H7849"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, then disperses \w them|strong="H5148"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w deprives|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* earth’s \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* reason \w and|strong="H5971"\w* makes \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w wander|strong="H8582"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trackless \w wasteland|strong="H8414"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* light; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* makes \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w stagger|strong="H8582"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w drunkards|strong="H7910"\w*.
